(She's a bit hopeful)"},{"lineNumber":259120,"originalJapaneseLine":"でも、エールは手を出さない。","translatedEnglishLine":"But Ale does not make a move."},{"lineNumber":259121,"originalJapaneseLine":"もし、レリコフともっと仲良くなったとしても、こんな形で","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if Ale grows closer to Lerikof, not in this way."},{"lineNumber":259122,"originalJapaneseLine":"その始めてはしたくないからとか・うんぬん","translatedEnglishLine":"Because he doesn't want that to be their first time or something like that."},{"lineNumber":259123,"originalJapaneseLine":"２回戦が行われた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The second round was held."},{"lineNumber":259124,"originalJapaneseLine":"コロシアム、エールのアナウンスがされる","translatedEnglishLine":"In the coliseum, Ale is announced."},{"lineNumber":259125,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして対戦相手がアナウンスされて出てくる","translatedEnglishLine":"Then the opponent is announced and emerges."},{"lineNumber":259126,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259127,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物隊長プロビオ","translatedEnglishLine":"Monster Captain Provio."},{"lineNumber":259128,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間以外も参加出来る、魔王ランスを討伐しようとしている強者","translatedEnglishLine":"Non-humans can participate too; he is a strong warrior trying to defeat Demon King Rance."},{"lineNumber":259129,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔剣カオスを手に入れるだけのつもりだったが、魔王の子がいるなら都合がいい","translatedEnglishLine":"He intended only to obtain the Magic Sword Chaos, but having the Demon King's child is convenient."},{"lineNumber":259130,"originalJapaneseLine":"　捕まえて人質にしよう","translatedEnglishLine":"He plans to capture and hold them hostage."},{"lineNumber":259131,"originalJapaneseLine":"街中","translatedEnglishLine":"In the middle of the town."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毎年、出場者、見学者が増えていっています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Every year, the number of participants and spectators increases.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界各国では、いくつかの武闘大会が行われていましたが、今ではここが世界一。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Various martial arts tournaments were held around the world, but now this is the number one in the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここで優勝し、闘神の地位を得た者が世界最強です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one who wins here and earns the status of Fighting God is the strongest in the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回は本戦出場の32枠を巡って９２名の猛者が参加してくれました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, 92 fierce warriors participated to compete for the 32 spots in the main tournament.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一位で予選を通過したのは、冒険者仲間では有名なトレンジャーハンター　アームズさん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one who passed the preliminaries in first place is Arms, the Treasure Hunter, famous among adventurer friends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一つでもあれで自慢出来るようなレア装備品を多数保有している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He possesses many rare pieces of equipment that one can be proud of even just one of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気になる参加者は・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The notable participants are...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス王子　ザンス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Prince Rizas, Zans

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮ王　乱義
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: King of JAPAN, Rangy

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン大統領の娘　レリコフ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: President Herman's daughter, Lerikof

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちら３名、すごい地位の方ですが、さらに、なんとあの魔王ランスの子供です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These three have great status, and moreover, they are children of that Demon King Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごい人が参加しています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amazing people are participating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダー、先の鬼畜王戦争で人類側の中心で戦った最強の格闘家
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alexander, the strongest martial artist who fought at the center of the human side in the recent Cruel King War.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズ、魔人殺しとして有名な世界最強のモンスターハンター
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms, the world’s strongest monster hunter, famous as a demon slayer.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他、適当に数名紹介　何かそれっぽいの作ってくれたらいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, several others introduced as appropriate — it would be good if something fitting is created.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近年まれにみる激戦になりそうです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It looks like it will be a fierce battle rarely seen in recent years.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回の優勝は誰でしょうね、とか、予想とかそれっぽく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who will win this time? Some predictions or something plausible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神大会本戦が始まった、トーナメント形式で３２名が戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Fighting God Tournament main event has begun, with 32 participants fighting in a tournament format.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 優勝まで５連勝すれば良い方式
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The format is to get five straight wins to become the champion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンス、乱義、アームズは、すでに１回戦を勝利している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zans, Rangy, and Arms have already won their first-round matches.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールは、まさか・・１回戦から相手が・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As for Ale, no way... the opponent is starting from the first round...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフ、がんばろー負けないぞー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lerikof: Let's do our best—won't lose!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コロシアムに入った、ファンファーレ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fanfare as they enter the coliseum.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールの紹介が行われる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ale's introduction is given.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール・モフス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ale Mofus.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとＡＬ教の法王のご子息です。そして魔王ランスの子でもあると言われて居ます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is surprisingly the son of the Pope of the AL religion, and is also said to be a child of Demon King Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これまで表舞台には一切出てきておらず存在を知られていませんでしたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until now, he has never appeared on the public stage and his existence was unknown,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 神異変以降、誰も神魔法を習得出来ないと言われてきましたが、彼は今現在の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since the divine upheaval, it has been said that no one can learn divine magic, but currently,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新たに取得し、また、誰も呼び出せなくなっていたレベル神も呼び出す事が出来るとの事です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he has acquired new powers and can also summon level gods that no one else can summon anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 神はいなくなった、それは事実ではない、それを証明する存在
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gods have disappeared—that is not true; he is proof of that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 片方は、レリコフ・ヘルマン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the other side is Lerikof Herman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大統領の娘です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is the president’s daughter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 紹介説明うんぬん・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Introduction and explanation, etc...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対峙するエールとレリコフ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ale and Lerikof confront each other.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お互いにがんばろー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's both do our best!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 控え室
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Waiting room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シュリさんが居ます、勝利おめでとう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shuri-san is here. Congratulations on your victory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では報酬です、後・・となりの部屋に対戦相手のパートナー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, here is your reward, and... next door is your opponent's partner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回は、レリコフさんがそのままいます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, Lerikof-san remains there as is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにをしてもいいのですよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You may do whatever you want.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※エールが女の場合は、シュリさんが女って損ですよねとか共通会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *If Ale is female, there will be common conversations like "It's a disadvantage that Shuri-san is also female," or the like.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフがいます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lerikof is here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいよ、エール君なら、（ちょっと期待している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's fine if it's you, Ale-kun. (She's a bit hopeful)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、エールは手を出さない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Ale does not make a move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし、レリコフともっと仲良くなったとしても、こんな形で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if Ale grows closer to Lerikof, not in this way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その始めてはしたくないからとか・うんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because he doesn't want that to be their first time or something like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２回戦が行われた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The second round was held.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コロシアム、エールのアナウンスがされる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the coliseum, Ale is announced.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして対戦相手がアナウンスされて出てくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then the opponent is announced and emerges.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物隊長プロビオ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster Captain Provio.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間以外も参加出来る、魔王ランスを討伐しようとしている強者
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Non-humans can participate too; he is a strong warrior trying to defeat Demon King Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣カオスを手に入れるだけのつもりだったが、魔王の子がいるなら都合がいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He intended only to obtain the Magic Sword Chaos, but having the Demon King's child is convenient.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捕まえて人質にしよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He plans to capture and hold them hostage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the middle of the town.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毎年、出場者、見学者が増えていっています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Every year, the number of participants and spectators increases.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界各国では、いくつかの武闘大会が行われていましたが、今ではここが世界一。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Various martial arts tournaments were held around the world, but now this is the number one in the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここで優勝し、闘神の地位を得た者が世界最強です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one who wins here and earns the status of Fighting God is the strongest in the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回は本戦出場の32枠を巡って９２名の猛者が参加してくれました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, 92 fierce warriors participated to compete for the 32 spots in the main tournament.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一位で予選を通過したのは、冒険者仲間では有名なトレンジャーハンター　アームズさん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one who passed the preliminaries in first place is Arms, the Treasure Hunter, famous among adventurer friends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一つでもあれで自慢出来るようなレア装備品を多数保有している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He possesses many rare pieces of equipment that one can be proud of even just one of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気になる参加者は・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The notable participants are...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス王子　ザンス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Prince Rizas, Zans

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮ王　乱義
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: King of JAPAN, Rangy

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン大統領の娘　レリコフ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: President Herman's daughter, Lerikof

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちら３名、すごい地位の方ですが、さらに、なんとあの魔王ランスの子供です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These three have great status, and moreover, they are children of that Demon King Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごい人が参加しています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amazing people are participating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダー、先の鬼畜王戦争で人類側の中心で戦った最強の格闘家
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alexander, the strongest martial artist who fought at the center of the human side in the recent Cruel King War.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズ、魔人殺しとして有名な世界最強のモンスターハンター
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms, the world’s strongest monster hunter, famous as a demon slayer.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他、適当に数名紹介　何かそれっぽいの作ってくれたらいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, several others introduced as appropriate — it would be good if something fitting is created.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近年まれにみる激戦になりそうです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It looks like it will be a fierce battle rarely seen in recent years.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回の優勝は誰でしょうね、とか、予想とかそれっぽく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who will win this time? Some predictions or something plausible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神大会本戦が始まった、トーナメント形式で３２名が戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Fighting God Tournament main event has begun, with 32 participants fighting in a tournament format.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 優勝まで５連勝すれば良い方式
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The format is to get five straight wins to become the champion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンス、乱義、アームズは、すでに１回戦を勝利している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zans, Rangy, and Arms have already won their first-round matches.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールは、まさか・・１回戦から相手が・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As for Ale, no way... the opponent is starting from the first round...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフ、がんばろー負けないぞー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lerikof: Let's do our best—won't lose!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コロシアムに入った、ファンファーレ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fanfare as they enter the coliseum.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールの紹介が行われる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ale's introduction is given.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール・モフス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ale Mofus.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとＡＬ教の法王のご子息です。そして魔王ランスの子でもあると言われて居ます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is surprisingly the son of the Pope of the AL religion, and is also said to be a child of Demon King Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これまで表舞台には一切出てきておらず存在を知られていませんでしたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until now, he has never appeared on the public stage and his existence was unknown,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 神異変以降、誰も神魔法を習得出来ないと言われてきましたが、彼は今現在の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since the divine upheaval, it has been said that no one can learn divine magic, but currently,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新たに取得し、また、誰も呼び出せなくなっていたレベル神も呼び出す事が出来るとの事です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he has acquired new powers and can also summon level gods that no one else can summon anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 神はいなくなった、それは事実ではない、それを証明する存在
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gods have disappeared—that is not true; he is proof of that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 片方は、レリコフ・ヘルマン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the other side is Lerikof Herman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大統領の娘です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is the president’s daughter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 紹介説明うんぬん・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Introduction and explanation, etc...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対峙するエールとレリコフ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ale and Lerikof confront each other.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お互いにがんばろー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's both do our best!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 控え室
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Waiting room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シュリさんが居ます、勝利おめでとう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shuri-san is here. Congratulations on your victory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: では報酬です、後・・となりの部屋に対戦相手のパートナー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, here is your reward, and... next door is your opponent's partner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回は、レリコフさんがそのままいます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, Lerikof-san remains there as is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにをしてもいいのですよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You may do whatever you want.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※エールが女の場合は、シュリさんが女って損ですよねとか共通会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *If Ale is female, there will be common conversations like "It's a disadvantage that Shuri-san is also female," or the like.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフがいます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lerikof is here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいよ、エール君なら、（ちょっと期待している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's fine if it's you, Ale-kun. (She's a bit hopeful)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、エールは手を出さない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Ale does not make a move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし、レリコフともっと仲良くなったとしても、こんな形で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if Ale grows closer to Lerikof, not in this way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その始めてはしたくないからとか・うんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because he doesn't want that to be their first time or something like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２回戦が行われた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The second round was held.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コロシアム、エールのアナウンスがされる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the coliseum, Ale is announced.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして対戦相手がアナウンスされて出てくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then the opponent is announced and emerges.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物隊長プロビオ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster Captain Provio.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間以外も参加出来る、魔王ランスを討伐しようとしている強者
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Non-humans can participate too; he is a strong warrior trying to defeat Demon King Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣カオスを手に入れるだけのつもりだったが、魔王の子がいるなら都合がいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He intended only to obtain the Magic Sword Chaos, but having the Demon King's child is convenient.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捕まえて人質にしよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He plans to capture and hold them hostage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the middle of the town.
